title: WP_Taxonomy
description: Core class used for interacting with taxonomies.

label.description: Name of the taxonomy shown in the menu. Usually plural.

description.description: A short descriptive summary of what the taxonomy is for.

public.description: Whether a taxonomy is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users.

publicly_queryable.description: Whether the taxonomy is publicly queryable.

show_ui.description: Whether to generate and allow a UI for managing terms in this taxonomy in the admin.

show_in_menu.description: Whether to show the taxonomy in the admin menu.

show_in_nav_menus.description: Whether the taxonomy is available for selection in navigation menus.

show_tagcloud.description: Whether to list the taxonomy in the tag cloud widget controls.

show_in_quick_edit.description: Whether to show the taxonomy in the quick/bulk edit panel.

show_admin_column.description: Whether to display a column for the taxonomy on its post type listing screens.

meta_box_cb.description: The callback function for the meta box display.

meta_box_sanitize_cb.description: The callback function for sanitizing taxonomy data saved from a meta box.

object_type.description: An array of object types this taxonomy is registered for.

query_var.description: Query var string for this taxonomy.

update_count_callback.description: Function that will be called when the count is updated.

show_in_rest.description:
Whether this taxonomy should appear in the REST API.

Default false. If true, standard endpoints will be registered with respect to $rest_base and $rest_controller_class.

rest_base.description: The base path for this taxonomy's REST API endpoints.

rest_controller_class.description:
The controller for this taxonomy's REST API endpoints.

Custom controllers must extend WP_REST_Controller.

rest_controller.description:
The controller instance for this taxonomy's REST API endpoints.

Lazily computed. Should be accessed using {@see WP_Taxonomy::get_rest_controller()}.

default_term.description: The default term name for this taxonomy. If you pass an array you have to set 'name' and optionally 'slug' and 'description'.

sort.description:
Whether terms in this taxonomy should be sorted in the order they are provided to `wp_set_object_terms()`.

Use this in combination with `'orderby' => 'term_order'` when fetching terms.

args.description: Array of arguments to automatically use inside `wp_get_object_terms()` for this taxonomy.

_builtin.description: Whether it is a built-in taxonomy.
